sentences.en: a period of rapid economic expansion
Breathing becomes more rapid and sweating starts.
sentences.cn: 呼吸变得更加急促并且开始流汗。

sentences.en: He fired three times in rapid succession (= one after another ) .
He gave forth a series of works in rapid succession.
sentences.cn: 他很快连续发表了一系列的作品.

sentences.en: He lives in Rapid City, South Dakota.
sentences.cn: 他住在南达科他州的拉皮德市。

sentences.en: His arm was a rapid blur of movement as he struck.
sentences.cn: 他出击时胳膊快速一晃，令人眼花缭乱。

sentences.en: Immersion in cold water resulted in rapid loss of heat.
sentences.cn: 浸泡在冷水中导致热量迅速散失。

sentences.en: Increased consumption of water has led to rapid depletion of groundwater reserves.
sentences.cn: 用水量的增加导致了地下水贮备迅速枯竭.

sentences.en: It seems reasonable to expect rapid urban growth.
sentences.cn: 似乎有理由期望城市快速发展。

sentences.en: Leonard made a rapid calculation: he'd never make it in time.
sentences.cn: 伦纳德快速盘算了一下：他肯定赶不上了。

sentences.en: Police pulled him over doing 120km/h, making rapid changes and tailgating.
sentences.cn: 警察令他把车靠边停下，因为他的时速高达120公里还一直快速变道、紧贴行驶。

sentences.en: The area has seen a rapid population growth.
The new trade agreement should facilitate more rapid economic growth.
sentences.cn: 新贸易协定应当会加快经济发展。

sentences.en: The patient made a rapid recovery.
the rapid assimilation of new ideas
Two rapid transit trains collided early this morning in Boston.
sentences.cn: 今晨早些时候，两辆高速火车在波士顿相撞。

sentences.en: Yul listened to their sophisticated, rapid-fire conversation.
sentences.cn: 尤尔听了他们老练的、连珠炮似的一番谈话。

words.tran_cn: 急流；高速交通工具，高速交通网

phrases.tran_cn: 快速公交系统；高速汽车运行系统；公车捷运
快速眼动（睡梦中眼球的快速转动）
高速交通；高速铁路交通；快速运输
快速移位；快速横动；快速行程

trans.tran_en: happening or done very quickly and in a very short time
